channel.title: Help with " when you wear an item you do godmode fly"
channel.description:
hello i want to add into my server that if i wear wings or something that it do automaticly do goddmode ( that flying mode like on some server is just the command ::god for admins or something)
i know how to add it but only with spec XD but i need it fly when you wear the wings :)
can anybody help me >?>?>? or send me the command ? just replace the item ID with #### i will understand

item.title: Help with " when you wear an item you do godmode fly"
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

/* declare this in client.java */ public void godmode() { // this is declaring a method called "godmode" // add the stuff to make you fly over here }

/* add this in client.java */ if (wearId == ####){ // replace the #### with cape ID godmode(); // this is calling the method we declared }

Read full topic
item.source: Help with " when you wear an item you do godmode fly"
